name: Dhaka College
admissionProcess: Raja Bazar Police Line College follows a simple and efficient four-step admission process. First, applicants fill out the application form. Second, they submit academic transcripts and test scores. If applicable, they attend an admission interview in step three. Finally, applicants receive the admission decision, opening doors to a rewarding academic journey at Raja Bazar Police Line College.
